meanings.definition: A large amount or number of something
meanings.sent1: I have lotsa toys in my room.
meanings.sent2: She bought lotsa groceries at the store.
meanings.sent3: There were lotsa balloons at the party.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered with lotsa colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The jar was filled with lotsa shiny marbles.

meanings.sent1: There are lotsa books on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: He has lotsa friends in school.
meanings.sent3: The fridge is full of lotsa delicious food.
meanings.sent4: The forest is home to lotsa different animals.
meanings.sent5: The market sells lotsa fresh fruits and vegetables.
